casebody.data:
Shambaugh, Appellant, v. Beverly Enterprises-Ohio, Inc., d.b.a. Valley View Nursing Home, Appellee.

[Cite as Shambaugh v. Beverly Enterprises-Ohio, Inc. (1995), 71 Ohio St.3d 563.]

*564(No. 94-2144 Submitted January 24, 1995 Decided February 22, 1995.) Wagner, Smith & Bittle and Katherine C. Hart Smith; Sandvoss & Lentz and Norman W. Sandvoss, for appellant. Reminger & Reminger Co., L.P.A., and Nicholas D. Satullo, for appellee.

The discretionary appeal is allowed. The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court on authority of Cosgrove v. Williamsburg of Cincinnati Mgt. Co., Inc. (1994), 70 Ohio St.3d 281, 638 N.E.2d 991.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents. Cook, J., not participating.
